description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. This is a one button game, but your Xbox has many buttons. Conundrum! That's why I added 52 person multiplayer. Grab one Xbox, 0-51 friends, and any button/stick/trigger/dpad, then mash like your score depends on it.  Fishie Fishie was freeware, visited WiiWare, and now hits XBLIGeeware as a streamlined, burpified, poly-piscine wonder. Enjoy!
